result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Case called: 9:28 am
Includes 14CM2099, 14CM2375, 15CM434, 15CM503, 15CM504.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence:
Defendant appears in person and with Atty Suzanne O'Neill;
*VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
14CM2099:
 Ct. 1 (Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)>>DRI.

14CM2375: 
Ct. 1 (Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (BJ-Repeater)>>DRI.

15CM434:
Ct. 1 (Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (BJ-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (BJ-Repeater)>>DRI.

15CM504>>
Ct. 1 (BJ-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (BJ-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 3  (Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)>>DRI.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA: 
15CM503:
Ct. 1 (Retail Theft-Intentionally Take-Repeater)>>NO CONTEST.
Ct. 2 (BJ-Repeater)>>NO CONTEST.
Ct. 3 (BJ-Repeater)>>NO CONTEST.
Ct. 4 (Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)>>NO CONTEST.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
15CM503:
Ct. 1 (Retail Theft-Intentionally Take-Repeater)>> Sentence W/H- 1 year probation, concurrent. CONDITIONS: Counseling as recommended, Restitution to be paid in the amount of $156.96 to the Pick N Save in Weston to be paid in the amount of $15/month while on probation, No Contact with the Pick N Save in Weston, No driving without valid Driver's License. Court Costs. Credit to be provided in a stipulation by Atty O'Neill.

Ct. 2 (BJ-Repeater)>> Sentence W/H- 1 year probation, concurrent. CONDITIONS: Counseling as recommended, Restitution to be paid in the amount of $156.96 to the Pick N Save in Weston to be paid in the amount of $15/month while on probation, No Contact with the Pick N Save in Weston, No driving without valid Driver's License. Court Costs. Credit to be provided in a stipulation by Atty O'Neill.

Ct. 3 (BJ-Repeater)>> Sentence W/H- 1 year probation, concurrent. CONDITIONS: Counseling as recommended, Restitution to be paid in the amount of $156.96 to the Pick N Save in Weston to be paid in the amount of $15/month while on probation, No Contact with the Pick N Save in Weston, No driving without valid Driver's License. Court Costs. Credit to be provided in a stipulation by Atty O'Neill.

Ct. 4 (Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)>> COURT w/holds finding and entry of guilt - COURT adopts written deferred entry of judgment agreement as signed by all parties and submitted to COURT. COURT defers matter for a period of 1 year for defendant to comply with all terms and conditions of written DEJ agreement.
If defendant is in full compliance with all terms and conditions of written DEJ agreement within that time frame and obtains no new criminal charges, State to AMEND to No Driver's License on person pursuant to 343.

DEOJ RH>> 6/13/2016 @ 9:00 am.
Bond continues.
